title: Design and Implementation of Customized Teaching Methods for Multicultural Learners

context.prior_knowledge: University-level life sciences/pharmacy foundational knowledge and multicultural education environment experience
context.additional_context: A project-based education course for biology and pharmacy majors analyzing the impact of cultural backgrounds on learning approaches and developing customized teaching methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze differences in deep/surface learning strategies among multicultural background learners.
Learners can propose optimal instructional design approaches based on academic disciplines (life sciences vs. pharmacy).
Learners can develop tools to evaluate the impact of gender, age, and cultural background on learning approaches.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
